guide.introduction: The desk offerings at Ikea and other office furniture supply places seemed boring, so I decided to build my own from plumbing pipes.
guide.introduction_rendered:
The desk offerings at Ikea and other office furniture supply places seemed boring, so I decided to build my own from plumbing pipes.

Relevant parts
  • Floor Flange
  • Pipe Tee
  • Pipe coupling
  • 12-inch Pipe Nipple
  • 10-inch pipe nipple
  • 9-inch pipe nipple
  • 6-inch pipe nipple
  • 5-inch pipe nipple
  • 1-inch wood screws
  • desk top
Tools
  • hand electric drill

parts.notes: you will need at least 4 of these.
you will need at least 6 of these.
you will need at most 6 of these, however they can be swapped out with valves or other types of couplings
you will need at least 4 of these.
you will need at least 8 wood screws

lines.text: Home Depot, Lowe's, or any other place which carries plumbing supplies should have all the parts you'll need.
lines.text_raw: Home Depot, Lowe's, or any other place which carries plumbing supplies should have all the parts you'll need.

lines.text: You'll also need to get a table top from IKEA (or wherever).
lines.text_raw: You'll also need to get a table top from IKEA (or wherever).

lines.text: This is going to be furniture. The pipes are likely extremely dirty and covered in grease and filth. Wash them using some dish soap or other degreaser.

guide.summary: Create a unique desk using standard off-the-shelf plumbing supplies and a wooden desktop from Ikea (or wherever you can find one).
